posts.author: blur927
posts.content:
Hey guys, first time poster long time lurker here.

I've been toying with making a paladin of Ilmater, and I thought it would be cool to try something a little different and make an archery based paladin, but then I realized all of my successful builds have come from you guys and I couldn't find one here that fit. ;)

The rules for this particular server are that paladins cannot multiclass, so it would have to be all paladin levels. You'd think that would make it easier for me but I'm still really struggling with the stat spread. I was thinking something like this:

Race Human

S 14
D 8
C 10
I 14
W 16 (21)
Ch 14

Then feats would be something like this:

1 power attack, WF Longbow
3 divine might
6 ZA
9 Improved Critical: Longbow
12 ???
15 ???
18 ???
20 ???

Any suggestions? I am open to different races but I kind of like roleplaying humans (I am not very imaginative I guess). Thanks in advance!

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
You must use feats for archery and Divine Might. Divine might is a goooood feat for archery. Not sure you need 14 INT.
16 Wis should be sufficient. Have 14 STR for damage, 8 DEX 10 Int, 10 or 12 for CON, spend evertyhing for Charisma. Taunt as one of your skills.

Sent fra min SM-G950F via Tapatalk

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
What Grim said, divine spell-bows are truly powerful if done right.

You will also have your Paladin spells to help you with AB so spend most of your points in Charisma.

Str: 14, Dex: 8, Con: 12, Int: 10, Wis: 15 (16), Cha: 16 (20) Is what I would do.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Power attack, Divine might, Divine shield, Weapon focus, Zen Archery, Blind-fight, Point blank shot & Rapid shot. Those are the standard feats, you can drop something in order to get  Called shot if you think you need it.
